title: Co-operative farming in East Germany
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Germany (East) - Social life and customs
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Social sciences - Study and teaching
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Collective farms
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social sciences - Study and teaching
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social structure
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Sociology, Rural
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Village communities
description: Describes co-operative farming in East Germany, illustrates patterns of family and village life and provides economic and social insights into communal living. Includes scenes of potato harvesting, dairy farming and the activities of the Communist Party organisation - the Free German Youth.
